section.title: Description of the NeXus Application-Program Interface
section.para: The NeXus API was written to shield (and hide) the complexity of the HDF API from scientific programmers and users of the NeXus Data Standard.

For a more detailed description of the internal workings of NAPI that is maintained (mostly) concurrent with code revisions, see NeXusIntern.pdf
NeXusIntern.pdf: http://svn.nexusformat.org/code/trunk/doc/api/NeXusIntern.pdf in the NeXus code repository. Likely this is only interesting for programmers who wish to hack the NAPI.
In , there is the mention of "a more complete version" of "a typical NeXus program written in C." Where is it?
